description:
Don’t let weather or lack of firewood get in the way of enjoying the warmth of a campfire.This travel-sized, portable firepit is great for camping trips, beach parties, or evening picnics, without the smoke, sparks, and ash of a wood fire. Hook it up to a 20lb propane tank with the included hose and regulator.

  • Steel body has a protective enamel finish
  • Stainless steel burner has output of 58,000 BTU/hr
  • Valve knob lets you adjust the flame height
  • Included natural lava rock set gives flickering effect similar to a wood fire
  • CSA approved is safe to use during most campfire bans (check local restrictions)
  • Includes Cover and Carry Kit, 10ft. hose with regulator, and a propane tank stabilizer ring
name: Outland Living Firebowl Deluxe Propane Fire Pit
